titles: The kings last farevvell to the world or The dead kings living meditations, at the approach of death denounced against him.
author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649, attributed name.
notes: Not in fact by King Charles I.
Verse - "Through fear of sharpe and bitter paine,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Charles --  I, --  King of England, 1600-1649 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
